content:
An office building has the shape of a right rectangular prism with width $20$ meters, length $40$ meters, and height $60$ meters.

![sky scraper](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/f388ad536b6ffce43eeefc376654ab275c1a3d4b.png)

**Drag the corners of the square below to draw the shape of one floor of the building.**
